attributes.action: Ban single use plastics across Europe
attributes.additional_details: The planet will be destroyed and nature as we know it will die
attributes.background: Many years ago world leaders Came together and banned cfc so this can be done and the planet will die if we don’t

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about laws in Europe are a matter for individual European Governments, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition about banning single use plastics in England, if that is what you would like. You will need to submit a full name to start a petition.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Ban the sale and use of single-use plastic bottles of water by 2028.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654450
